name: HI Denver Hostel
description: Popular hostel near downtown. Dorms from $35/night. Free WiFi, breakfast included.

name: 11th Avenue Hostel
description: Cozy hostel in Capitol Hill. Private rooms available. Great for solo travelers.

name: La Quinta Inn Denver Downtown
description: Budget-friendly hotel near convention center. Clean rooms from $89.

name: Moxy Denver Cherry Creek
description: Trendy hotel perfect for tech events. Rooftop bar, modern design.

name: The Maven Hotel
description: Boutique hotel in Dairy Block. Walking distance to venues. Great for networking.

name: The Crawford Hotel
description: Luxury hotel in Union Station. Historic building, modern amenities.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Denver
description: 5-star luxury downtown. Spa, fine dining, impeccable service.

name: Illegal Pete's
description: Mission-style burritos. Huge portions, fast service. Devs favorite!

name: Biker Jim's Gourmet Dogs
description: Famous gourmet hot dogs. Try the elk jalape√±o! Denver institution.

name: Denver Central Market
description: Food hall with multiple vendors. Perfect for groups with different tastes.

name: Avanti Food & Beverage
description: Collective eatery in LoHi. Rooftop with mountain views. Great for meetups.

name: Guard and Grace
description: Upscale steakhouse downtown. Perfect for celebrating your funding round.

name: ETH Denver Main Event
description: The main ETH Denver conference. Talks, workshops, hackathon. Must attend!

name: BUIDLHub
description: Pre-ETH Denver hacker house. Build projects, meet co-founders.

name: DeFi Day Denver
description: Side event focused on DeFi protocols. Deep dives and alpha.

name: NFT Gallery Night
description: Art exhibition featuring NFT artists. Free drinks, networking.

name: DAO Denver Meetup
description: Weekly meetup for DAO enthusiasts. Governance discussions, project showcases.

name: Galvanize Denver
description: Tech campus with coworking. Day passes available. Fast WiFi, coffee.

name: WeWork Union Station
description: Premium coworking near trains. Meeting rooms, phone booths, 24/7 access.

name: Denver Public Library
description: Free workspace downtown. WiFi, power outlets, quiet areas.

name: Ratio Beerworks
description: Local craft brewery in RiNo. Great for casual meetups after events.

name: Death & Co Denver
description: World-famous cocktail bar. Perfect for closing deals or celebrating.

name: Temple Denver
description: Electronic music club. Big name DJs, great sound system.

name: Tracks Denver
description: Largest dance club in Denver. Multiple rooms, diverse music.

name: REI Denver Flagship
description: Outdoor gear store. Rent equipment for mountain trips. Expert advice.

name: Escape Room Denver
description: Team building activity. Great for hackathon teams. Multiple themes.
